title: Replace existing logo and favicon assets with provided logo image (no URL/path changes)

requirements.summary: Regenerate the existing logo image file at the exact path referenced by Header and Maintenance screen using uploaded `012.jpeg`, preserving transparency/compatibility with light and dark themes.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx` and `frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScreen.tsx` continue to reference `/assets/generated/logo-finance-ki-sharan-transparent.dim_200x100.png` with no broken images.
The displayed logo in the header (height ~40px) and maintenance screen (height ~80px) visually matches the uploaded logo design from `012.jpeg`.
The generated logo has a clean, transparent background (or a background that blends seamlessly with both light and dark themes).

file_operations.description: Replace/regenerate this static logo PNG (200×100) using the design from uploaded `012.jpeg`, ensuring clean transparency (or a theme-friendly background) and comfortable padding so it renders well at ~40px and ~80px heights. Keep the filename and location unchanged so existing references continue to work.

Verify (without changing the referenced path) that the header continues to use `/assets/generated/logo-finance-ki-sharan-transparent.dim_200x100.png` and that sizing remains ~40px tall with no broken image.

Verify (without changing the referenced path) that the maintenance screen continues to use `/assets/generated/logo-finance-ki-sharan-transparent.dim_200x100.png` and that sizing remains ~80px tall with no broken image.

requirements.summary: Regenerate the existing favicon image file at the exact path referenced by the app using uploaded `012.jpeg`, optimized for legibility at 32×32.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` continues to reference `/assets/generated/favicon-logo.dim_32x32.png` with no broken favicon.
Browser tab favicon visually matches the uploaded logo design from `012.jpeg` and remains legible at 32×32.

file_operations.description: Replace/regenerate this static favicon PNG (32×32) derived from `012.jpeg`, simplified/cropped for legibility at small size. Keep the filename and location unchanged so the existing reference remains valid.
Verify (without changing the referenced path) that the favicon link continues to reference `/assets/generated/favicon-logo.dim_32x32.png` and loads without errors.
